main.subtitle: Hello
main.title: I am Rashadul Islam
main.description: Frontend Web Developer from Dhaka, passionate about Laravel and React.js. Currently working at BDOSC as a Frontend Web Developer, I focus on building error-free web applications and solving real-world problems. I enjoy learning, sharing knowledge, and improving web performance. Skilled in ReactJS, JavaScript, and PHP, I'm also learning React Native, Node.js, Next.js, MongoDB, and Flutter. I love collaborating on Laravel and MERN Stack projects and exploring new places in my free time.

projects.title: Tourisom & Travels
projects.description: A full-stack web application built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js), offering seamless booking, destination exploration, and user management. Features include dynamic tour packages, secure authentication, a user-friendly interface, and responsive design for an enhanced travel planning experience.

projects.title: Trade Ventures
projects.description: A responsive frontend application built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, designed for seamless user interaction and dynamic content management. The project offers a clean UI, fast performance, and optimized navigation for enhanced user experience. It includes modern design principles and responsive layouts, ensuring accessibility across all devices.

projects.title: SSL Garments System
projects.description: The SSL Garments System (Frontend) is a dynamic and responsive web application designed to manage garment production processes. Developed using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, this frontend interface enables users to interact with the garment management system, track orders, view inventory, and manage production workflows. The application features a user-friendly design with a focus on performance, offering a seamless experience across various devices.

faq.faqDescription: Here are some common questions and answers to help you understand my services better.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: I specialize in front-end development using modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I also offer UI/UX design, website performance optimization, and full-stack web solutions.

items.question: Do you work with international clients?
items.answer: Yes, I have experience working with clients globally, including those from the US, UK, Canada, Australia, and more. I ensure clear communication and timely delivery for every project.

items.question: What technologies do you use?
items.answer: I mainly work with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, MongoDB, and other modern tools to build fast, responsive, and scalable applications.

items.question: How can I contact you?
items.answer: You can reach out via the contact form on my website, or directly through my email or social media channels linked below.

items.question: Can you help with performance optimization?
items.answer: Absolutely! I offer performance audits and optimization services to improve load speed, SEO, and user experience of your website or application.

items.question: Are you open to freelance or contract work?
items.answer: Yes, I‚Äôm open to freelance opportunities, contract projects, and collaborations. Let‚Äôs discuss how I can help bring your ideas to life.
